name: Dylan Dog 16: Fantasmi
overview: Dylan Dog 16: Fantasmi is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Simulmondo, which was released in Europe in 1994. Five boys, a boring evening… Why not have a séance? An innocent game becomes a nightmare with no escape, because, by shuffling the cards from the afterlife, you can draw the ace of spades. Peggy and her friends have awakened the rage of the ghosts and now they must flee their revenge. Dylan Dog seeks meaning in this chain of mysterious deaths, because perhaps behind the apparent fury of the dead ... perhaps the madness of the living is hidden.
